Liquidations & Surplus / Machine Directory / Hydraulic Presses / Machine Details

200 Ton Pacific Model

*Details*

600 Ton Pacific Model 600-D-10-54 Downstroke Self Contained Hydraulic Press – New 1979 Housing Type – Gib Guided - Dual Cylinder –“T-Slotted” Bed and Slide

Serial No.: 8378 (1979)

Bed Area (Nominal):123" L-R x 54" F-B (T-Slotted F-B)

Slide Area (Nominal):123" L-R x 54" F-B (T-Slotted F-B)

Distance Between Housings:25" L-R

Stroke of Gib Guided Slide:0" - 18" Max.

Daylight Opening:36" Max.

Max. Upper Die Weight:10,000 lbs.

Speeds Approx.:192 IPM Fast Closing

74 IPM Slow Close

25 IPM Pressing

45 IPM Slow Return

123 IPM Fast Return

Power Unit (Top Rear):60 HP 460/3/60 Motor Driving Hydraulic Unit.

Weight Approx.:106,000 lbs.

Physical Dimension Approx.:13' L-R x 5' F-B x 26' H

Controls:Push Button Operation with Stroke, Pressure and Speed Control. Allen Bradley PLC Added in 2000. Light Curtains.

Phone: 847-894-3434 | Email: gerrardmachinery@gmail.com
